com.invensense.casdk.client

Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.invensense.casdk.client.MainActivity

  • public class MainActivity
extends Activity
    This Activity represents first page of the application. It includes the fragmented layout to display rolling dice and values of different sensors that are present on wearable device board.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  MainActivity.SensorsUpdateThread
      This thread class is responsible to send the messages to the Handler with an interval in case if the bluetooth is connected successfully and able to receive data stream.
